stories.title: If correlation is not causation, what is?

stories.text:
I have known Ukranians and Russians, and I feel personal destruction in the violence that has been done.

There is no going back from this, but I hope that some virtue can be salvaged from this horror, that we might never fight again.

It might be in vain, but it is my foolish desire.
stories.title: Foolish War
RISC-V Architecture Profiles 0.5 (RVI20, RVA20 and RVA22) for Discussion

stories.text:
Around a month ago DDG announced they would be "down ranking" Russian disinformation (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30627892&p=3).

This sounds like it should just be lower in the search results, however that is not the case.

Searching for "tass bucha" has no results from tass.com. In fact "site:tass.com bucha" gives zero results.

Meanwhile Google has no issues displaying these results.

Tass is not even banned on an EU level like RT and Sputnik are.

Turns out it is not possible to search for the other sides story on DDG and Bing. Google wins again..
stories.title: Tell HN: DuckDuckGo and Bing removed tass.com from their search results
